products.name: iPhone 14
products.specification:
Brand: Apple
Color: Red
Storage: 128 GB ROM, 6 GB RAM
Display: Super Retina XDR display 6.1‑inch (diagonal) all‑screen OLED display
Camera: 12MP Main | 12MP Ultra Wide
Operating System: iOS 16
Processor: A15 Bionic Chip, 6 Core Processor
Battery: Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery
Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2
Face ID: Enabled
Water and Dust Resistance: Rated IP68
Dimensions: 146.7mm x 71.5mm x 7.6mm
Weight: 171 grams
Additional Details: The iPhone 14 comes in a stunning Red color, adding a vibrant and bold look to your device. It offers ample storage with 128 GB ROM and 6 GB RAM, allowing you to store your apps, photos, videos, and more. The Super Retina XDR display provides a 6.1‑inch all‑screen OLED display, offering vibrant colors and sharp visuals. The iPhone 14 features a powerful camera setup with a 12MP Main camera and a 12MP Ultra Wide camera, enabling you to capture stunning photos and videos. It runs on the latest iOS 16 operating system, providing a seamless and intuitive user experience. Powered by the A15 Bionic Chip with a 6 Core Processor, the iPhone 14 delivers fast and efficient performance. The built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery ensures long-lasting usage, and the device supports 5G connectivity for fast internet speeds. It also features Face ID for secure authentication and is rated IP68 for water and dust resistance. With its sleek dimensions and lightweight design, the iPhone 14 is easy to carry and use on the go.

products.name: HP Spectre x360
products.description: Versatile and stylish 2-in-1 laptop from HP.
products.specification:
Brand: HP
Color: Dark Ash Silver
Processor: Intel Core i7
RAM: 16GB
Storage: 512GB SSD
Display: 13.3-inch FHD Touchscreen
Graphics: Intel Iris Xe
Operating System: Windows 10
Battery: Up to 15 hours
Weight: 1.27kg
Additional Details: The HP Spectre x360 features a 360-degree hinge design that allows it to be used in different modes such as laptop, tablet, tent, and stand. It comes with a vibrant 13.3-inch Full HD touchscreen display, providing crisp and vivid visuals. The laptop is equipped with an Intel Core i7 processor for powerful performance, and it has 16GB of RAM and a 512GB SSD for smooth multitasking and ample storage. The Intel Iris Xe graphics deliver impressive visuals for multimedia and light gaming. It runs on the Windows 10 operating system and offers up to 15 hours of battery life, making it suitable for long hours of productivity or entertainment. The laptop is lightweight and portable, making it easy to carry on the go. It also includes features like a backlit keyboard and Bang & Olufsen speakers for an enhanced audio experience.
